00014 #ifndef INC_LPC_VIC_H
00015 #define INC_LPC_VIC_H
00016 
00017 // Vectored Interrupt Controller Registers (VIC)
00018 typedef struct
00019 {
00020   REG32 irqStatus;                      // IRQ Status Register
00021   REG32 fiqStatus;                      // FIQ Status Register
00022   REG32 rawIntr;                        // Raw Interrupt Status Register
00023   REG32 intSelect;                      // Interrupt Select Register
00024   REG32 intEnable;                      // Interrupt Enable Register
00025   REG32 intEnClear;                     // Interrupt Enable Clear Register
00026   REG32 softInt;                        // Software Interrupt Register
00027   REG32 softIntClear;                   // Software Interrupt Clear Register
00028   REG32 protection;                     // Protection Enable Register
00029   REG32 _pad0[3];
00030   REG32 vectAddr;                       // Vector Address Register
00031   REG32 defVectAddr;                    // Default Vector Address Register
00032   REG32 _pad1[50];
00033   REG32 vectAddr0;                      // Vector Address 0 Register
00034   REG32 vectAddr1;                      // Vector Address 1 Register
00035   REG32 vectAddr2;                      // Vector Address 2 Register
00036   REG32 vectAddr3;                      // Vector Address 3 Register
00037   REG32 vectAddr4;                      // Vector Address 4 Register
00038   REG32 vectAddr5;                      // Vector Address 5 Register
00039   REG32 vectAddr6;                      // Vector Address 6 Register
00040   REG32 vectAddr7;                      // Vector Address 7 Register
00041   REG32 vectAddr8;                      // Vector Address 8 Register
00042   REG32 vectAddr9;                      // Vector Address 9 Register
00043   REG32 vectAddr10;                     // Vector Address 10 Register
00044   REG32 vectAddr11;                     // Vector Address 11 Register
00045   REG32 vectAddr12;                     // Vector Address 12 Register
00046   REG32 vectAddr13;                     // Vector Address 13 Register
00047   REG32 vectAddr14;                     // Vector Address 14 Register
00048   REG32 vectAddr15;                     // Vector Address 15 Register
00049   REG32 _pad2[48];
00050   REG32 vectCntl0;                      // Vector Control 0 Register
00051   REG32 vectCntl1;                      // Vector Control 1 Register
00052   REG32 vectCntl2;                      // Vector Control 2 Register
00053   REG32 vectCntl3;                      // Vector Control 3 Register
00054   REG32 vectCntl4;                      // Vector Control 4 Register
00055   REG32 vectCntl5;                      // Vector Control 5 Register
00056   REG32 vectCntl6;                      // Vector Control 6 Register
00057   REG32 vectCntl7;                      // Vector Control 7 Register
00058   REG32 vectCntl8;                      // Vector Control 8 Register
00059   REG32 vectCntl9;                      // Vector Control 9 Register
00060   REG32 vectCntl10;                     // Vector Control 10 Register
00061   REG32 vectCntl11;                     // Vector Control 11 Register
00062   REG32 vectCntl12;                     // Vector Control 12 Register
00063   REG32 vectCntl13;                     // Vector Control 13 Register
00064   REG32 vectCntl14;                     // Vector Control 14 Register
00065   REG32 vectCntl15;                     // Vector Control 15 Register
00066 } vicRegs_t;
00067 
00068 // VIC Channel Assignments
00069 #define VIC_WDT         0
00070 #define VIC_TIMER0      4
00071 #define VIC_TIMER1      5
00072 #define VIC_UART0       6
00073 #define VIC_UART1       7
00074 #define VIC_PWM         8
00075 #define VIC_PWM0        8
00076 #define VIC_I2C         9
00077 #define VIC_SPI         10
00078 #define VIC_SPI0        10
00079 #define VIC_SPI1        11
00080 #define VIC_PLL         12
00081 #define VIC_RTC         13
00082 #define VIC_EINT0       14
00083 #define VIC_EINT1       15
00084 #define VIC_EINT2       16
00085 #define VIC_EINT3       17
00086 #define VIC_ADC         18
00087 
00088 // Vector Control Register bit definitions
00089 #define VIC_ENABLE      (1 << 5)
00090 
00091 // Convert Channel Number to Bit Value
00092 #define VIC_BIT(chan)   (1 << (chan))
00093 
00094 #endif
